document.full_text: the probable cause of the airplane crash that killed former senator ted stevens and four others last summer was "temporary unresponsiveness" by the pilot, federal safety investigators said in a report on tuesday.
document.title: ntsb: ted stevens plane crash pilot "unresponsive"
lines_and_colors: the probable cause of the airplane crash that killed former senator ted stevens and four others last summer was "temporary unresponsiveness" by the pilot, federal safety investigators said in a report on tuesday.
